Seekker looks around, grabbing some ammo, then some grenades 
he stashes away.  Looking some more he sees a wierd shine in a 
corner.  He runs to it and picks it up carefully looking over it.  Then 
throws it away realizing that it is tin foil.  He then grabs a laser 
pistol.  He takes aim ready to test it then doesnt.  "Right, Don't 
know what I need this for, not like i jsut fire my bullets whereever.
